page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: General review of area Farmland,Grass & Root Crops; Woodland with Conifers & Deciduous Trees. Allerthorpe(village) Canal Head(hamlet) South/East area. Barmby Moor(Village) an Airfield(disused) Frog Hall,& Sewage Works, centre area. The whole area is crossed from W/N.W. to E/S.E. by the A 1079 (Old Roman Rd) this road connects York & Hull, with access roads to the farms, villages & hamlet. HOUSING: Allerthorpe, Barmby Moor, Canal Head. LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS; Allerthorpe Common,Airfield, Frog Hall. ECOLOGY;Allerthorpe Common, Frog Hall. LOCAL HISTORY;Barmby Moor & War Graves,Frog Hall. RECREATION;A.Common, B.Moor, Canal Head, Airfield (Gliding).
